thread.title: Perfect weekend stay!
thread.title_full: Perfect weekend stay! - Review of Premier Inn London Angel Islington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Heather_c34
title: Perfect weekend stay!
text: Stayed here before seeing Hamlet at the Almeida theatre. Perfect location as it was less than a 10 minute walk. Hotel is a 2 minute walk (at most) to the main high street which has plenty of coffee shops and restaurants to choose from. Hotel was so quiet at night and the rooms were clean & modern. Would definitely stay here again (or use Premier inn @ London Bank/ Tower Hill).
